# @paprika/spinner - 0.2.14

## Description

Spinner component

## Installation

```
yarn add @paprika/spinner
```

or with npm:

```
npm install @paprika/spinner
```

## Props

### Spinner

| Prop      | Type               | required | default           | Description |
| --------- | ------------------ | -------- | ----------------- | ----------- |
| a11yText  | string             | false    | null              |             |
| className | string             | false    | null              |             |
| caption   | string             | false    | null              |             |
| size      | ShirtSizes.DEFAULT | false    | ShirtSizes.MEDIUM |             |
